result.markdown:
---
title: "HFV Colors"
---


## Primary palette

HousingForward Virginia uses a six-color palette.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(scales)
library(chroma)

hfv_pal <- c(
  "#011e41", # Shadow
  "#40c0c0", # Sky
  "#8b85ca", # Lilac
  "#259591", # Grass
  "#b1005f", # Berry
  "#e0592a"  # Desert
  )

scales::show_col(hfv_pal, borders = "#ffffff", cex_label = 0.8)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](colors-hfv_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

...

## Sequential

Single-color sequential gradient using Shadow (`#011e41`).


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
chroma::show_col(interp_colors(12, colors = c("#ccd2d9", "#011e41"), interp = "bezier"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](colors-hfv_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
